segments.name: iPhone
key_points: Strong double-digit growth in each geographic segment
97% customer satisfaction for iPhone 12 family
Very high demand for iPhone 12 lineup
New all-time high in active installed base
June quarter records in most markets
Early innings of 5G adoption

segments.name: Services
key_points: Over 700 million paid subscriptions
Up 150 million paid subscriptions year-over-year
All-time records for cloud services, music, video, advertising and payment services
June quarter records for App Store and Apple Care
35 Emmy Nominations
Launch of Spatial Audio for Apple Music
Introduction of Apple Podcast subscriptions

segments.name: Mac
key_points: Best four quarters ever for Mac
92% customer satisfaction rating
Strong response to M1-powered Macs
Around half of purchases from new-to-Mac customers
June quarter records in most markets
Strong enterprise adoption of M1 Macs

segments.name: iPad
key_points: Launch of M1-powered iPad Pro
95% customer satisfaction rating
Around half of purchases from new-to-iPad customers
Highest June quarter in nearly a decade
Supply constraints impacting sales
Strong response to new iPad Pro

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: June quarter records in every geographic segment
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers
Strong response to new Apple TV 4K
Strong customer response to AirTag
Launch of new Apple TV 4K with redesigned Siri remote
Continued expansion of Apple Watch reach

gross_margin.context: Up 80 basis points from last quarter

expectations.revenue: Very strong double digit year-over-year growth
expectations.foreign_exchange: 3 points less favorable than June quarter
expectations.services: Return to more typical growth rate
expectations.supply_constraints: Greater than June quarter, primarily impacting iPhone and iPad

strategic_initiatives: Innovation grants to historically black colleges and universities
Affordable housing initiative in California with $1 billion contribution
New retail store opening in Los Angeles (Apple Tower Theater)
